articles.description: The hit BBC show draws to a potentially indefinite close when the final episode of its sixth series ends on Sunday evening.
articles.content: Season six of Line Of Duty has left fans with more questions than answers, with viewers flocking to Twitter to question what exactly is DCI Jo Davidson is up to, whether Kate Fleming has really left … [+5181 chars]

articles.author: Mark Kermode
articles.title: Nomadland review – Chloe Zhao’s triumphant ode to community - The Guardian
articles.description: Zhao’s triple Oscar winner, inspired by the ‘new nomads’ of recession-hit America, eschews conflict in favour of quiet humanity
articles.content: Accepting her Oscar for best director last week, the Chinese film-maker Chloé Zhao remarked: I have always found goodness in the people I met, everywhere I went in the world. That sentiment runs thro… [+3683 chars]

articles.author: Abbie Bray
articles.title: Naga Munchetty and Charlie Stayt replaced in BBC Breakfast shake-up - Express
articles.description: NAGA MUNCHETTY and Charlie Stayt were replaced on Sunday morning's BBC Breakfast by Roger Johnson and Sima Kotecha, who stepped in to take their place.
